name: SkyFarm (Fridge Raiders)
description:
Sky Farm is a relaxing farming sim that takes place on a floating island.

Grow and sell crops, customise your island and help build a community!

Features

- Plant seeds and water them every day to grow crops.

- Sell crops to earn money, which can be spent at shops

- Explore the sky islands and forage materials

- Decorate your house and the island

- Customise your character with different hair and clothes

- Talk to different NPCs with varying personalities

- Complete quests for NPCs to get rewards and improve friendship

- Day/Night cycle and weather

Controls

WASD - Movement

Left shift - Walk slowly

Left click - Interact, use tool (picking up furniture enabled)

Right click - Interact, use tool (picking up furniture disabled)

QE - Rotate item when placing

Tab - Inventory

C - Crafting

L - Quests

Mouse wheel - Scroll through hotbar, scroll menus

1, 2, ..., 9, 0 - Select hotbar slots

NPCs

There are a total of 8 NPCs that can be unlocked - Try and find them all!

  • Check the tooltips on seeds to see which seasons they grow best in. Healthy crops will grow faster and produce more yield.

  • Items placed in the shipping box will be sold each night. You can also sell items to shops to get money instantly.

  • You can buy the recipe for a compost bin from Jimjim - This will let you turn plants into compost, which can be used to improve the health of crops

  • Talking to NPCs every day can get you quests, items, crafting recipes, tips and can even unlock new NPCs

  • Gifting NPCs will improve their friendship - If they like the gift. When an NPC likes you, they may gift you items in return when you talk to them.

  • Check your mailbox over the first week for items and advice
